title: Red String - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Oneshot   Politics   Schemes And Conspiracies   Short Story
author: 夜未央
description: Princess Anping of the previous dynasty was in love with Shangguan Zhao, the son of the great general. Everything changed when the enemy’s country attacked their country and defeated them. From that time on, Princess Anping died and became consort Rong, the most hated and wicked woman of this dynasty.>
